import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchUserTypes } from "./services/userServices" import { fetchGrades } from "./services/gradeServices" export const TestModule = () => { const [grades, setGrades] = useState([]) const [studentForm, setStudentForm] = useState({}) const [userTypes, setUserTypes] = useState([]) const [toggle, setToggle] = useState(false) const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchUserTypes().then((data) => { setUserTypes(data) }) fetchGrades().then((data) => { setGrades(data) }) } const handleStudentInput = (event) => { const copy = { ...studentForm } const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value copy[name] = value setStudentForm(copy) } const handleToggle = () => { setToggle(!toggle) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, []) return ( <> {toggle ?
